page.title: 10Village Shop, Swanton Morley
page.content:
The shop is a member of the Mace Group. It is open from 8a.m.-6p.m. weekdays and Saturdays and from 9a.m. -1p.m. on Sunday. Most supplies are ordered Monday and delivered Thursday. The Mace Group supply groceries, a few vegetables, alcohol and sweets. Bread is supplied by a local baker and from Sunblest. Milk, from the local dairy, is supplied on alternate days.
The busiest times are Mondays and Saturdays, and Sunday mornings. It is part of the same premises as the Post Office and definitely benefits from the trade which that brings. It sells, apart from food and vegetables, a wide range of household equipment; e.g.plugs, fuses, pencils batteries, pegs. The average sale is Â£2 per customer.
